content:
PR #23948 refactors the proof of the classic Eisenstein criterion using the generalized one.
It also moves the file Mathlib.RingTheory.EisensteinCriterion to Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Eisenstein.Criterion.
(Anyway, that file is only imported by Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Eisenstein.Basic, and by one the Abel-Ruffini theorem in Archive.)
This leads to a 3% increase in imports. I don't know whether this is a good idea or not.
